Thank you UnderworldDemon666 for this. It was a perfect torrent. I did have a problem, but I figured It now? I am running Vista 32bit service pack 2. I clicked setup, and a pop up appeared with an error? It only works with Service pack 1. To solve this. Right click that set up, go to properties at the bottom, then compatibility. In compatibility mode check the box, scroll down, and find service pack 1, click OK, and start over. Works perfectly.
